com.marginallyclever.ro3.node.nodes.behavior.Decorator
com.marginallyclever.ro3.node.nodes.behavior.decorators.ForceFailure
public class ForceFailure extends Decorator

ForceFailure is a Decorator that forces its child to return Behavior.Status.FAILURE.
